00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #ifndef __UNIX_
00043  #include <stdlib.h>

00049 
00050 /* The actual insertion of faces, loops, edges and vertices into the */
00051 /* proper lists takes place with the procedure addlist. It adds the  */
00052 /* node pointede to by which into the linked list of nodes owned by  */
00053 /* where. As a special case, solids are simply linked to the list    */
00054 /* of all solids; in this case, where has no effect. The type of     */
00055 /* which is again given in terms of what and must be one of the      */
00056 /* literals SOLID, FACE, LOOP, EDGE or VERTEX.                       */
00057 /* To unlink children from their parents, the corresponding inverse  */
00058 /* procedure dellist(what, which, where) is used. Specifically, the  */
00059 /* node which of type what (SOLID, FACE, LOOP, EDGE, VERTEX) will be */
00060 /* removed from the respective linked list of the parent node which. */
00061 /* Again, solids are an exception. Obviously, dellist would be used  */
00062 /* in the implementation of del in analogous way to addlist and new. */
00063 
00064 void MSD_lowAddList(int what, NPTYPE which, NPTYPE where)
00065 {
00066    switch (what)
00067    {
00068        case SOLID:
00069 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00070        which->s.nxt   = objary;
00071        which->s.prevs = SNIL;
00072 #else
00073        SolNxt(which)   = objary;
00074        SolPrevS(which) = SNIL;
00075 #endif
00076        if (objary != SNIL)
00077        {
00078           SolPrevS(objary) = (SPTYPE)which;
00079        }
00080        objary = (SPTYPE)which;
00081        break;
00082 
00083        case SHELL:
00084 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00085        which->d.nextd = where->s.sshells;
00086        which->d.prevd = DNIL;
00087        if (where->s.sshells != DNIL)
00088        {
00089           where->s.sshells->prevd = (DPTYPE)which;
00090        }
00091        where->s.sshells = (DPTYPE)which;
00092        which->d.ssolids = (SPTYPE)where;
00093 #else
00094        SheNextD(which) = SolSShells(where);
00095        ShePrevD(which) = DNIL;
00096        if (SolSShells(where) != DNIL)
00097        {
00098           ShePrevD(SolSShells(where)) = (DPTYPE)which;
00099        }
00100        SolSShells(where) = (DPTYPE)which;
00101        SheSSolids(which) = (SPTYPE)where;
00102 #endif
00103        break;
00104 
00105        case FACE:
00106 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00107        which->f.nextf = where->d.sfaces;
00108        which->f.prevf = FNIL;
00109        if (where->d.sfaces != FNIL)
00110        {
00111           where->d.sfaces->prevf = (FPTYPE)which;
00112        }
00113        where->d.sfaces = (FPTYPE)which;
00114        which->f.fshell = (DPTYPE)where;
00115 #else
00116        FacNextF(which) = SheSFaces(where);
00117        FacPrevF(which) = FNIL;
00118        if (SheSFaces(where) != FNIL)
00119        {
00120           FacPrevF(SheSFaces(where)) = (FPTYPE)which;
00121        }
00122        SheSFaces(where) = (FPTYPE)which;
00123        FacFShell(which) = (DPTYPE)where;
00124 #endif
00125        break;
00126 
00127        case LOOP:
00128 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00129        which->l.nextl = where->f.floops;
00130        which->l.prevl = LNIL;
00131        if (where->f.floops != LNIL)
00132        {
00133           where->f.floops->prevl = (LPTYPE)which;
00134        }
00135        where->f.floops = (LPTYPE)which;
00136        which->l.lface  = (FPTYPE)where;
00137 #else
00138        LooNextL(which) = FacFLoops(where);
00139        LooPrevL(which) = LNIL;
00140        if (FacFLoops(where) != LNIL)
00141        {
00142           LooPrevL(FacFLoops(where)) = (LPTYPE)which;
00143        }
00144        FacFLoops(where) = (LPTYPE)which;
00145        LooLFace(which)  = (FPTYPE)where;
00146 #endif
00147        break;
00148 
00149        case EDGE:
00150 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00151        which->e.nexte = where->d.sedges;
00152        which->e.preve = ENIL;
00153        if (where->d.sedges != ENIL)
00154        {
00155           where->d.sedges->preve = (EPTYPE)which;
00156        }
00157        where->d.sedges = (EPTYPE)which;
00158 #else
00159        EdgNextE(which) = SheSEdges(where);
00160        EdgPrevE(which) = ENIL;
00161        if (SheSEdges(where) != ENIL)
00162        {
00163           EdgPrevE(SheSEdges(where)) = (EPTYPE)which;
00164        }
00165        SheSEdges(where) = (EPTYPE)which;
00166 #endif
00167        break;
00168 
00169        case VERTEX:
00170 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00171        which->v.nextv = where->d.sverts;
00172        which->v.prevv = VNIL;
00173        if (where->d.sverts != VNIL)
00174        {
00175           where->d.sverts->prevv = (VPTYPE)which;
00176        }
00177        where->d.sverts = (VPTYPE)which;
00178 #else
00179        VerNextV(which) = SheSVerts(where);
00180        VerPrevV(which) = VNIL;
00181        if (SheSVerts(where) != VNIL)
00182        {
00183           VerPrevV(SheSVerts(where)) = (VPTYPE)which;
00184        }
00185        SheSVerts(where) = (VPTYPE)which;
00186 #endif
00187        break;
00188 
00189        case GROUP:
00190 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00191        which->g.nextg = grpary;
00192        which->g.prevg = GNIL;
00193 #else
00194        GrpNextG(which) = grpary;
00195        GrpPrevG(which) = GNIL;
00196 #endif
00197        if (grpary != GNIL)
00198        {
00199           GrpPrevG(grpary) = (GPTYPE)which;
00200        }
00201        grpary = (GPTYPE)which;
00202        break;
00203 
00204        case AXIS:
00205 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00206        which->a.nexta = axsary;
00207        which->a.preva = ANIL;
00208 #else
00209        AxsNextA(which) = axsary;
00210        AxsPrevA(which) = ANIL;
00211 #endif
00212        if (axsary != ANIL)
00213        {
00214           AxsPrevA(axsary) = (APTYPE)which;
00215        }
00216        axsary = (APTYPE)which;
00217        break;
00218 
00219        default:
00220        fprintf(stderr, "addlist: codigo incorreto!\n");
00221        break;
00222    }
00223 }
00224 
00225 void MSD_lowDelList(int what, NPTYPE which, NPTYPE where)
00226 {
00227    SPTYPE s;
00228 
00229 #ifdef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00230    SPTYPE Sol;
00231    DPTYPE She;
00232    FPTYPE Fac;
00233    LPTYPE Loo;
00234    EPTYPE Edg;
00235    VPTYPE Ver;
00236 #endif
00237    int ip;
00238 
00239    switch (what)
00240    {
00241        case SOLID:
00242        if (SetTrace)
00243        {
00244           ip = 0;
00245           for (AllSolids(s))
00246           {
00247              if (s == (SPTYPE)which)
00248              {
00249                 ip = 1;
00250              }
00251           }
00252           if (ip == 0)
00253           {
00254              fprintf(stderr, "*** del(SOLID): aborted ***\n");
00255              error = TRUE;
00256              return;
00257           }
00258        }
00259 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00260        if (which->s.nxt != SNIL)
00261        {
00262           which->s.nxt->prevs = which->s.prevs;
00263        }
00264        if (which->s.prevs != SNIL)
00265        {
00266           which->s.prevs->nxt = which->s.nxt;
00267        }
00268        if (objary == (SPTYPE)which)
00269        {
00270           objary = which->s.nxt;
00271        }
00272 #else
00273        Sol = SolPrevS(which);
00274        if (SolNxt(which) != SNIL)
00275        {
00276           SolPrevS(SolNxt(which)) = Sol;
00277        }
00278        Sol = SolNxt(which);
00279        if (SolPrevS(which) != SNIL)
00280        {
00281           SolNxt(SolPrevS(which)) = Sol;
00282        }
00283        if (objary == (SPTYPE)which)
00284        {
00285           objary = SolNxt(which);
00286        }
00287 #endif
00288        break;
00289 
00290        case SHELL:
00291        if (SetTrace)
00292        {
00293           if (findd((SPTYPE)where, (DPTYPE)which) == 0)
00294           {
00295              fprintf(stderr, "*** del(SHELL): aborted ***\n");
00296              error = TRUE;
00297              return;
00298           }
00299        }
00300 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00301        if (which->d.prevd != DNIL)
00302        {
00303           which->d.prevd->nextd = which->d.nextd;
00304        }
00305        if (which->d.nextd != DNIL)
00306        {
00307           which->d.nextd->prevd = which->d.prevd;
00308        }
00309        if ((DPTYPE)which == where->s.sshells)
00310        {
00311           where->s.sshells = which->d.nextd;
00312        }
00313 #else
00314        She = SheNextD(which);
00315        if (ShePrevD(which) != DNIL)
00316        {
00317           SheNextD(ShePrevD(which)) = She;
00318        }
00319        She = ShePrevD(which);
00320        if (SheNextD(which) != DNIL)
00321        {
00322           ShePrevD(SheNextD(which)) = She;
00323        }
00324        She = SheNextD(which);
00325        if ((DPTYPE)which == SolSShells(where))
00326        {
00327           SolSShells(where) = She;
00328        }
00329 #endif
00330        break;
00331 
00332        case FACE:
00333        if (SetTrace)
00334        {
00335           if (findf((DPTYPE)where, (FPTYPE)which) == 0)
00336           {
00337              fprintf(stderr, "*** del(FACE): aborted ***\n");
00338              error = TRUE;
00339              return;
00340           }
00341        }
00342 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00343        if (which->f.prevf != FNIL)
00344        {
00345           which->f.prevf->nextf = which->f.nextf;
00346        }
00347        if (which->f.nextf != FNIL)
00348        {
00349           which->f.nextf->prevf = which->f.prevf;
00350        }
00351        if ((FPTYPE)which == where->d.sfaces)
00352        {
00353           where->d.sfaces = which->f.nextf;
00354        }
00355 #else
00356        Fac = FacNextF(which);
00357        if (FacPrevF(which) != FNIL)
00358        {
00359           FacNextF(FacPrevF(which)) = Fac;
00360        }
00361        Fac = FacPrevF(which);
00362        if (FacNextF(which) != FNIL)
00363        {
00364           FacPrevF(FacNextF(which)) = Fac;
00365        }
00366        Fac = FacNextF(which);
00367        if ((FPTYPE)which == SheSFaces(where))
00368        {
00369           SheSFaces(where) = Fac;
00370        }
00371 #endif
00372        break;
00373 
00374        case LOOP:
00375        if (SetTrace)
00376        {
00377           if (findl((LPTYPE)which, (FPTYPE)where) == 0)
00378           {
00379              fprintf(stderr, "*** del(LOOP): aborted ***\n");
00380              error = TRUE;
00381              return;
00382           }
00383        }
00384 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00385        if (which->l.prevl != LNIL)
00386        {
00387           which->l.prevl->nextl = which->l.nextl;
00388        }
00389        if (which->l.nextl != LNIL)
00390        {
00391           which->l.nextl->prevl = which->l.prevl;
00392        }
00393        if ((LPTYPE)which == where->f.floops)
00394        {
00395           where->f.floops = which->l.nextl;
00396        }
00397 #else
00398        Loo = LooNextL(which);
00399        if (LooPrevL(which) != LNIL)
00400        {
00401           LooNextL(LooPrevL(which)) = Loo;
00402        }
00403        Loo = LooPrevL(which);
00404        if (LooNextL(which) != LNIL)
00405        {
00406           LooPrevL(LooNextL(which)) = Loo;
00407        }
00408        Loo = LooNextL(which);
00409        if ((LPTYPE)which == FacFLoops(where))
00410        {
00411           FacFLoops(where) = Loo;
00412        }
00413 #endif
00414        break;
00415 
00416        case EDGE:
00417        if (SetTrace)
00418        {
00419           if (findes((DPTYPE)where, (EPTYPE)which) == 0)
00420           {
00421              fprintf(stderr, "*** del(EDGE): aborted ***\n");
00422              error = TRUE;
00423              return;
00424           }
00425        }
00426 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00427        if (which->e.preve != ENIL)
00428        {
00429           which->e.preve->nexte = which->e.nexte;
00430        }
00431        if (which->e.nexte != ENIL)
00432        {
00433           which->e.nexte->preve = which->e.preve;
00434        }
00435        if ((EPTYPE)which == where->d.sedges)
00436        {
00437           where->d.sedges = which->e.nexte;
00438        }
00439 #else
00440        Edg = EdgNextE(which);
00441        if (EdgPrevE(which) != ENIL)
00442        {
00443           EdgNextE(EdgPrevE(which)) = Edg;
00444        }
00445        Edg = EdgPrevE(which);
00446        if (EdgNextE(which) != ENIL)
00447        {
00448           EdgPrevE(EdgNextE(which)) = Edg;
00449        }
00450        Edg = EdgNextE(which);
00451        if ((EPTYPE)which == SheSEdges(where))
00452        {
00453           SheSEdges(where) = Edg;
00454        }
00455 #endif
00456        break;
00457 
00458        case VERTEX:
00459        if (SetTrace)
00460        {
00461           if (findv((DPTYPE)where, (VPTYPE)which) == 0)
00462           {
00463              fprintf(stderr, "*** del(VERTEX): aborted ***\n");
00464              error = TRUE;
00465              return;
00466           }
00467        }
00468 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00469        if (which->v.prevv != VNIL)
00470        {
00471           which->v.prevv->nextv = which->v.nextv;
00472        }
00473        if (which->v.nextv != VNIL)
00474        {
00475           which->v.nextv->prevv = which->v.prevv;
00476        }
00477        if ((VPTYPE)which == where->d.sverts)
00478        {
00479           where->d.sverts = which->v.nextv;
00480        }
00481 #else
00482        Ver = VerNextV(which);
00483        if (VerPrevV(which) != VNIL)
00484        {
00485           VerNextV(VerPrevV(which)) = Ver;
00486        }
00487        Ver = VerPrevV(which);
00488        if (VerNextV(which) != VNIL)
00489        {
00490           VerPrevV(VerNextV(which)) = Ver;
00491        }
00492        Ver = VerNextV(which);
00493        if ((VPTYPE)which == SheSVerts(where))
00494        {
00495           SheSVerts(where) = Ver;
00496        }
00497 #endif
00498        break;
00499 
00500        case GROUP:
00501 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00502        if (which->g.nextg != GNIL)
00503        {
00504           which->g.nextg->prevg = which->g.prevg;
00505        }
00506        if (which->g.prevg != GNIL)
00507        {
00508           which->g.prevg->nextg = which->g.nextg;
00509        }
00510        if (grpary == (GPTYPE)which)
00511        {
00512           grpary = which->g.nextg;
00513        }
00514 #else
00515        if (GrpNextG(which) != GNIL)
00516        {
00517           GrpPrevG(GrpNextG(which)) = GrpPrevG(which);
00518        }
00519        if (GrpPrevG(which) != GNIL)
00520        {
00521           GrpNextG(GrpPrevG(which)) = GrpNextG(which);
00522        }
00523        if (grpary == (GPTYPE)which)
00524        {
00525           grpary = GrpNextG(which);
00526        }
00527 #endif
00528        break;
00529 
00530        case AXIS:
00531 #ifndef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00532        if (which->a.nexta != ANIL)
00533        {
00534           which->a.nexta->preva = which->a.preva;
00535        }
00536        if (which->a.preva != ANIL)
00537        {
00538           which->a.preva->nexta = which->a.nexta;
00539        }
00540        if (axsary == (APTYPE)which)
00541        {
00542           axsary = which->a.nexta;
00543        }
00544 #else
00545        if (AxsNextA(which) != ANIL)
00546        {
00547           AxsPrevA(AxsNextA(which)) = AxsPrevA(which);
00548        }
00549        if (AxsPrevA(which) != ANIL)
00550        {
00551           AxsNextA(AxsPrevA(which)) = AxsNextA(which);
00552        }
00553        if (axsary == (APTYPE)which)
00554        {
00555           axsary = AxsNextA(which);
00556        }
00557 #endif
00558        break;
00559 
00560        default:
00561        fprintf(stderr, "dellist: codigo incorreto!\n");
00562        break;
00563    }
00564 }
